property.name: Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Use Bombing Max Dice Sides And Bonus
notes
property.value:
Aggression 1942

Follows v3 type rules.

*Units have 10% upkeep

*Unit production values are 10 times smaller than territory values.

*Repairing is 10 times more expensive.

*Factories have AA ability.

*Victory is achieved by capturing an enemy capital first.

*Still in progress.

by Navalland
